post.title: image badly pixelated on 40" tv -help!
post.content: i have had a canon sx30 for about a year and have been very pleased, images look great on laptop or printed. i have just invested in a home media server accessed via a sony bdp 480. all of the pics i have taken on the canon look terrible, yet all of my previous casio files look great. i have tried shooting at max size and smooth compression and the problem persists grateful for any ideas - and happy new year al
